mapper.insert: insert into point(point_date, id, point_value, contents, total_point,order_num) values(sysdate, #{id}, #{point_value}, #{contents}, #{total_point},#{order_num})
mapper.select: select * from point where point_date = (select max(point_date) from point where id = #{id})
select * from point where id=#{id} order by point_date desc
select * from point order by point_date desc
